record.name: KP Oli
record.description: This jholey commie butcher Oli unleashed his thug cops on peaceful youth protesters, slaughtering students in a bloodbath over his corrupt shitshow.

record.name: Mahesh Basnet
record.description: Slimy Jholey thug from UML,hides behind Oli's corrupt skirt while raping women,forcing abortions,spewing death threats like gutless mobster.

record.name: Prachanda
record.description: The mastermind of every clash, he plays his dirty political games and enjoys the blood of thousands of nepalese who fought for change,a better future.
